C

chanceToGetHigherGrants() - Method in class ru.nsu.pozhidaev.RecordBook
chance to increase student grant calculated by collecting all grades, if there is no grades less than 5, student will get higher grant.
chanceToGetRedDiploma() - Method in class ru.nsu.pozhidaev.RecordBook
chance to get red diploma calculated by collecting all final grade of exams and diffpasses, if there is no three grades, and number of fives is more than 74 percentage, and have excellent qualification work.
chanceToStudyFree() - Method in class ru.nsu.pozhidaev.RecordBook
